issue.title: [C++] Downgrade llvm to llvm@9 to correct build failures for gandiva
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10361](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10361). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
llvm@10 was removed from homebrew and the default was changed to 11 which caused build failures for gandiva.
<https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core/pull/62798#issuecomment-711606370>

Downgrade llvm@9 as a temporary fix for build failures.
